amendment.description: Page 14, after line 22, insert the following new subparagraph (and redesignate the subsequent subparagraph accordingly): (K) Whether the rule or set of rules is in full compliance with the requirements of section 801(a)(1)(A) of title 5, United States Code.

vote.text: On agreeing to the McSally amendment (A003) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A003) offered by Ms. McSally.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the McSally amendment (A003) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
